statements: UPDATE employees SET access_level = 2, completed_maintenance_work = true WHERE employee_id = 101;

UPDATE employees SET completed_maintenance_work = TRUE, assigned_tasks = ARRAY['task1', 'task2'] WHERE access_level > 5 AND employee_id = 101;
